summary: A letter from the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York to the Metropolitan Detention Center, providing the password for a drive containing witness materials, government exhibits, and discovery related to the criminal case against Ghislaine Maxwell.

persons.name: Damian Williams
persons.context: Signatory of the letter providing access to discovery materials in the Ghislaine Maxwell case.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The subject of the criminal case (20 Cr. 330) for which witness materials and discovery are being provided.

connections.description: Williams, as U.S. Attorney, is overseeing the prosecution of Maxwell, as evidenced by this official correspondence regarding her case materials.

events.title: Transmission of Case Materials Password
events.description: The U.S. Attorney's Office sends the password for a drive containing discovery and evidence to the Metropolitan Detention Center regarding the Ghislaine Maxwell case.

keyFacts: The document is official correspondence from the U.S. Attorney's Office regarding the criminal case against Ghislaine Maxwell (20 Cr. 330).
A password was provided to access a drive containing witness materials, government exhibits, and discovery pertinent to Ghislaine Maxwell.
The document indicates ongoing legal proceedings and evidence handling in the Maxwell case as of November 2021.
Damian Williams was the United States Attorney for the Southern District of New York at the time.
